message: My turn to propose a deal. Let's be reasonable; time is money.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out, and we're both losing money. This is my final offer.
You're losing value, I'm being generous!
Okay, Alice, let's split this right down the middle.  It's the fairest option and avoids further losses for both of us.
Your money is losing value fast, take it!
